amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to engage in hostilities in Libya in contravention of the War Powers Resolution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 41 printed in House Report 114-623 to block funds from being used to engage in hostilities in Libya in contravention of the War Powers Resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A039) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A039) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Yoho.
